title: Create New Archive
singleplayerNotice: In single player mode, only normal difficulty is available
steamIdInfo: This step is optional. You can create an archive without adding Steam IDs.
steamIdInvalid: Steam ID can only contain numbers or use offline format(xxxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx)!
steamIdDuplicate: Steam ID {steamId} already exists, please do not add it repeatedly!
steamIdRequired: Please enter a valid Steam ID
steamApiKeyInvalid: Steam API key is invalid or expired. Please update your Steam API key in settings.
steamApiRateLimit: Steam API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
steamApiKeyNotConfigured: Steam API key not configured. Please add your Steam API key in settings.
selectPlayerMessage: Please select a Steam ID player to edit inventory
archiveCreatedMessage: Your new archive has been created and is ready to use.
archiveNameExists: Archive name already exists, please choose a different name.
archiveCreatedError: Archive creation failed, please try again.
noPlayersHint: Please add a player Steam ID to manage inventory
